List of years in Belgium

Events from the year 1972 in Belgium.

Contents

  • 1 Incumbents
  • 2 Events
  • 3 Deaths
  • 4 References

Incumbents[edit]

  • Monarch: Baudouin
  • Prime Minister: Gaston Eyskens

Events[edit]

  • May 8 - Sabena Flight 571
  • November 12-14 - Cyclone Quimburga

Deaths[edit]

  • January 5 - Gérard Devos, footballer
  • January 21 - André Fierens, footballer[1]
  • February 17 - François Devries, footballer
  • March 30 - Raymond Decorte, cyclist[2]
  • April 17 - Jan Engels, cyclist
  • June 5 - Louis Mottiat, cyclist
  • December 20: Karel Kaers, cyclist

References[edit]

  1. ^ "André FIERENS - Olympic Football". International Olympic Committee. 15 June 2016. Retrieved 14 May 2018. 
  2. ^ "Raymond Decorte". www.procyclingstats.com. Retrieved 14 May 2018.
